title: Metacask and Grace O'Malley Irish Whiskey unveil "THE GRACE" - a groundbreaking collection of 501 digitally connected bottles of premium whiskey
description: It is the launch of a special Irish whiskey collection of bottles that have been painted by a female street artist in a mural of the historic Irish pirate Grace O'Malley - and each bottle comes with an NFT as a digital certificate of ownership.
